p: Drug resistance of bacteria was a big problem in modern agriculture and the food industry. It was urgent to develop new bioactive molecules from natural sources with lower side effects as a substitute for antibiotics [ 31]. Some plant essential oil had complex chemical compositions that make it difficult for bacteria to develop resistance and had become an important source of novel antibiotics against drug-resistant bacteria [ 32]. Freitas conclude that Î±-pinene had antibacterial and antibiotic-modulating activities by enhancing the activity of norfloxacin and gentamicin [ 33]. Therefore, EEO as a natural product had good antibacterial activity that might be used for improved agents of antibiotics.
